RTCPeerConnectionIcecandidateerror_event.summary: The WebRTC API event icecandidateerror is sent to an if an error occurs while performing ICE negotiations through a {{Glossary("STUN")}} or {{Glossary("TURN")}} server. The event object is of type , and contains information describing the error in some amount of detail.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
